attributes.action: Ban noisy fireworks to prevent animal deaths.
attributes.additional_details: So that people aren't having to loose their animals due to shock, strokes or a heart attack because of the unacceptable, selfish and inconsiderate noise that they make. It's not fair. In fact I think it should be made illegal.
attributes.background: Stop the sales of loud fireworks.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Make it illegal to sell, buy and use fireworks other than silent ones
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223

Reduce the maximum decibel limit on fireworks from 120 to 90
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700049

Ban fireworks
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700199
